questions.question: What is the default value of the data type boolean in Java?

What is the purpose of the 'break' statement in a switch statement?
options: To continue to the next case

options: To create an instance of a class
To refer to the current object
questions.answer: To refer to the current object

options: To create an instance of a class
To refer to the current object

options: To create an instance of a class

options: To check if an object is an instance of a particular class
To create an instance of a class
questions.answer: To check if an object is an instance of a particular class
